dcterms:creator: A. Dhall
A. Kaur
R. Goecke
T. Gedeon
dcterms:description: The EmotiW2018 AFEW dataset consists of dynamic facial expression video clips collected from movies and TV shows, labeled with seven different emotions: anger, disgust, fear, happiness, sadness, surprise, and neutral.
dcterms:title: EmotiW2018 AFEW

dcterms:creator: P. Lucey
J. F. Cohn
T. Kanade
J. Saragih
Z. Ambadar
I. Matthews
dcterms:description: The CK+ dataset is an extended version of the Cohn-Kanade dataset, providing a complete set of facial expression images annotated for action units and emotion-specific expressions.
dcterms:title: CK+ dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Pantic
M. Valstar
R. Rademaker
L. Maat
dcterms:description: The MMI dataset is a web-based database for facial expression analysis, containing a variety of facial expressions captured in controlled conditions.
dcterms:title: MMI dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Zhao
X. Huang
M. Taini
S. Li
M. Pietik√§inen
dcterms:description: The Oulu-CASIA dataset contains facial expression videos captured in near-infrared light, focusing on facial expression recognition under varying illumination conditions.
dcterms:title: Oulu-CASIA dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Li
W. Deng
J. Du
dcterms:description: The RAF-DB dataset is a reliable crowdsourced dataset for expression recognition in the wild, containing facial images labeled with various emotions.
dcterms:title: RAF-DB dataset

dcterms:creator: Z. Zhang
P. Luo
C. Loy
X. Tang
dcterms:description: The ExpW dataset is designed for facial expression recognition and interpersonal relation prediction, containing a diverse set of facial images.
dcterms:title: ExpW dataset

dcterms:creator: I. Goodfellow
D. Erhan
P. L. Carrier
A. Courville
M. Mirza
B. Hamner
W. Cukierski
Y. Tang
D. Thaler
D. Lee
dcterms:description: The FER-2013 dataset is a facial expression recognition dataset that was used in machine learning contests, containing grayscale images of faces labeled with emotions.
dcterms:title: FER-2013 dataset
